#id=1
#text=I went to the hair stylist for a trim .
#id=2
#text=While I was seated in the waiting area , I happened to glance a cover of a hair styling book and , being intrigued , decided to pick it up and browse .
#id=3
#text=I found a haircut I really liked .
#id=4
#text=My hairstylist called my name and led me back to her barber chair .
#id=5
#text=She wrapped a drape around my shoulders to protect my clothes from hair clippings , asking me what I was looking to do with my hair this time .
#id=6
#text=I pointed out the book I had been looking through and showed her the picture I had found .
#id=7
#text=She nodded , spritzed water on my head with her spray bottle , then grabbed her comb and started running it through my hair .
#id=8
#text=She then grabbed her scissors and started trimming the length , parted some hair to one side and clipped that side .
#id=9
#text=Then she parted and clipped the other to match , all the while chatting with me about stuff .
#text=A few moments later , she applied a little hair gel and worked it through my hair .
#text=Pleased with the outcome , she spun me around so I could see the mirror and asked how I liked my new hairdo .
#text=I loved it so much that I gave her a nice tip when I paid the bill !
